Introduction

Kim Garam is a South Korean former idol under Source Music. She is a former member of the girl group LE SSERAFIM.

She debuted with the group on May 2, 2022, with their first mini album "Fearless."

Just 18 days after their debut, on May 20, 2022, Source Music announced that Garam would be on hiatus due to bullying accusations. Subsequently, on July 20, 2022, HYBE and Source Music announced the termination of Garam's contract, finalizing her departure from the group.
